document.full_text: the taliban are trying to disrupt plans for the start of a security transfer in afghanistan, from foreign troops to the national army and police, with attacks targeting key handover areas, the country's intelligence agency said wednesday.
document.title: taliban seeking to derail transition, afghan spy agency says
lines_and_colors: the taliban are trying to disrupt plans for the start of a security transfer in afghanistan, from foreign troops to the national army and police, with attacks targeting key handover areas, the country's intelligence agency said wednesday.
